ThingDef.label: primitive research table
ThingDef.description: Study surrounding materials here to research new things.

ThingDef.label: research bench
ThingDef.description: A simple bench with writing implements and low-tech scientific tools. Researchers work here to discover new things.

ThingDef.label: hi-tech research bench
ThingDef.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Research is sped up by the high-tech tools. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: sun lamp
ThingDef.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: advanced sun lamp
ThingDef.description: Heat and light an area at the same time but needs a lot of energy. Perfect to grow some plants.

ThingDef.label: caravan spot
ThingDef.Description: Designates a spot where caravans will be formed.

ThingDef.label: trading spot
ThingDef.Description: Designates a spot where traders will stop when visiting your colony.

ThingDef.label: orbital trade beacon
ThingDef.description: Required for orbital trading. You can only sell goods that are near an orbital trade beacon. Can be placed indoors.

ThingDef.label: comms console
ThingDef.description: Communicate with nearby ships here for negotiation and trade.

ThingDef.label: subspace burst transponder
ThingDef.description: Contacts Ships at a distance and guides them to your colony.

ThingDef.label: multi-analyzer
ThingDef.description: Increases research speed. Needs to be placed near a research bench. One research bench can be linked to only one multi-analyzer.

ThingDef.label: laboratory counter
ThingDef.description: A convenient countertop surface.

ThingDef.label: laboratory station
ThingDef.Description: An auxillary research station for expanding laboratory operations. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: research terminal
ThingDef.Description: A compact research terminal for expanding laboratory operations. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: vitals monitor
ThingDef.description: Increases patients treatment quality. Needs to be placed adjacent to a medical bed. One medical bed can be linked to only one vitals monitor.

ThingDef.label: advanced vitals monitor
ThingDef.description: An advanced vitals monitor capable of diagnosing the root cause of almost any symptom. Needs to be placed adjacent to a Hi-tech medical bed.

ThingDef.label: file cabinet
ThingDef.description: A important place to store important documents about important experiments used for important research on important technologies. Increases research speed slightly when next to a research bench.

ThingDef.label: pattern designer
ThingDef.description: A important place to store textiles used for increases work speed on textile benches.

ThingDef.label: large tool cabinet
ThingDef.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tools cabinets.

ThingDef.label: small tool cabinet
ThingDef.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tool cabinets.

ThingDef.label: cooking tools
ThingDef.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tool cabinets.

ThingDef.label: firefoam popper
ThingDef.description: When touched by fire or triggered by hand, this pops and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam in a circular field around itself.

ThingDef.label: moisture pump
ThingDef.description: Very slowly removes moisture from nearby terrain, converting marshes or shallow water into dry ground. Does not affect deep water.

ThingDef.label: terraforming pump
ThingDef.description: This pump slowly expands a field of growable soil around itself. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: grave
ThingDef.description: Place the deceased in graves to give them a decent final resting place. Can only be dug in dirt.

ThingDef.label: sarcophagus
ThingDef.description: An ornamental burial receptacle for the honored dead.

ThingDef.label: cryptosleep casket
ThingDef.description: A self-powered sarcophagus designed to keep a person in a state of suspended animation for many years.

ThingDef.label: ancient cryptosleep casket
ThingDef.description: This cryptosleep casket looks like it has been here for a very long time. Who knows what it might contain?

ThingDef.label: holosuite
ThingDef.description: A man-able holosuite that your colonists can use to practice their social skills with.

ThingDef.label: punching bag
ThingDef.description: A man-able punching bag that your colonists can use to practice their melee skills with.

ThingDef.label: ground-penetrating scanner
ThingDef.description: A downward-facing penetrating radar, combined with sonar and magnetic imagers, allows you to detect (but not identify) minerals buried deep under the surface. Requires a huge amount of electricity.

ThingDef.label: pod launcher
ThingDef.description: A fueling port for launching one transport pod. Pod launchers can launch as a group - but the launchers must be placed adjacent to each other.

ThingDef.label: transport pod
ThingDef.description: A launchable suborbital-travel cargo pod capable of carrying people, items, or animals. Can be used for transport, surprise attacks, or reinforcing battles.

ThingDef.Label: mobile mineral sonar
ThingDef.Description: The mobile mineral sonar is used to detect hidden minerals and oil deposits. - It will scan the surrounding rocks autonomously with the embedded energy packs. - Supplying some additional power will hasten the scan rate.

ThingDef.label: dermal regenerator
ThingDef.description: A medical device able to scan and repair surface tissue.

ThingDef.label: impaction charge
ThingDef.description: Detonates on command. Creates a directed blast of plasma, which impacts right down to the bedrock. Used for asteroid mining and accessing underground resources.
